greet: Good morning bartender! Have you seen the news?
We made it, prohibition is finally over!
It was a very long hearing but it was worth it. Good things come to those who wait, and the Bartenders' Union has won.
I've always had my eye on you, young one, and I'm proud of you and your courage to stick it out all this time. I knew you had what it takes from the moment I left you the keys of this bar.
Indeed, all this time, behind these old glasses...
I know, I know, don't worry about me, I'm a master of disguise, I've been doing it for over 30 years.
I bet you didn't recognize me the second time I walked into your bar {BAR NAME}.
Now you can finally carry on the bartender's legacy in this town.
Thank you for your perseverance. Goodbye, son.
